full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 LIED STATES DEPARTMENT OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE REPORT OF INVESTIGATION ADMINISTRATIVE PAGE TITLE FILE NUMBER WAI, Chut A18 438 344 REPORT NUMBER DATE PLACE (4/1/69) CENTRAL OFFICE AND REGIONAL REFERENCES 1 4/11/69 (md) LOS CONTROL OFFICE TRANSFERRED TO: G-23 LINE TYPE OF INVESTIGATION Fraud" alain Labor LOS 503 REPORTABLE Certification 400 deport DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH NATIONALITY DATE PLACE AND MANNER OF ENTRY February 22, 1911 - China China September 27, 1968 - Honolulu as a P6-1 Immigrant DISTRIBUTION REVIEWED AND APPROVED (SEE COMMENT) DATE PLACE LOS 1 - File w/Ex. "A" & "B" SIGNATURE 1 - File A19 053 360 (Subject's wife) NAME AND TITLE B. R. Pearson, Supervisory General Investigator REVIEWED AND APPROVED (SEE COMMENT) DATE PLACE SIGNATURE NAME AND TITLE APPROVED (REGIONAL OFFICE) DATE NAME AND TITLE SIGNATURE STATUS OF INVESTIGATION PENDING PENDING INACTIVE X CLOSED REFERRED TO CONTROL OFFICE Investigation conducted after the matter was referred to Investigations by the Assistant District Director, Travel Control, Los Angeles, when it was ascertained that the SUBJECT did not accept a position with his sponsoring employer following his admission to the United States as an immigrant. COMMENT It appears that the SUBJECT may be amenable to deportation. An application has been submitted for the issuance of an Order to Show Cause alleging that the position the SUBJECT was authorized to accept in the United States was not in existence when he applied for his immigrant visa and was admitted to the United States as an immi- grant. The telegraphic code words are: WEBAK, RECOJ. RAZEZ 4/11/69 King Philip H. Smith, Investigato THIS PAGE IS NOT TO BE DISTRIBUTED OUTSIDE THE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FORM G-166A (Rev. 6-1-66) FRI-LPC-9-6641M-2733
